bio:
In the era of technological advances and rapid changes, the software can make or break your business. It’s key to ensuring you meet fast-changing customer needs, stay ahead of the competition, and keep business operations running smoothly – every day.

We are Software Development Experts and working on Front-end, & Back-end development. Our expertise is spread across the board ranging from Software Development, Custom Application Development, Web Development, AI/iOT Solutions.

We have successfully completed over 80 Software Development Projects over the past 12 years at the companies.
Our specialties include JavaScript, Node.js, Python, REST API, Express, Redis, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, React, Redux, CI/CD, and Cloud services. We have worked on every step of the development lifecycle from identifying the client’s real needs to designing the systems architecture as well as implementation. I love creating scalable back ends and Rena is an expert in crafting modern and well-performing web, and desktop apps with front-end development (React).
We are a life-long learner and am looking forward to working on your exciting and challenging projects.
Full-time working: more than 50 hrs in a week

I have a great imagination, detailed with my work and can make a story come alive. Each book that I have ready to go is 10,000 word books with description and back page information of the books.

I like fixed price writing for clients. I enjoy the communication that goes with the client that I'm writing for. I enjoy writing altogether. I actually started out looking for horror writing jobs and there were none when I began looking so I turned my attention to romance and come to find out I have a talent in it.

bio: I am a freelancer based in India. I thus work as an individual – self motivated, dedicated and well disciplined towards his work, and NOT a firm or organization with many employees.I have been working as a Virtual Assistant for 8 years and have worked on varied tasks for employers based in the US, Australia, New Zealand, UK, etc with a 100% track record on client satisfaction and efficiency. All my past projects have lasted for long periods of time. I do not like to leave any task midway and stick to my employers once we have a work understanding established. Besides the accuracy and correctness of work, I assure my employers of a prompt communication at all times with no “non-showups”. I can be reached via email or IM at all times and would always be reliable as a worker. Regular updates on work progress and daily report of work done is an integral part of my work ethics.I as an individual would be willing to go out of the way to perform the task to the be

I have worked at both monthly and hourly pay rates. There is no set or rigid pay rate that I ask for. It basically all depends upon the task at hand, the effort it would require and our mutual understanding as to a rate that suits both of us. One thing could be assured – it never would be unreasonable.Payment can be made once you are satisfied with my work and trust me to be worthy of assisting you. As for work updates, communication and availability, I assure a prompt response at all times. I am available on email most of the day and on IM during work times or as required and essential. I also have my website set up by me in a bid to give an identity to my work and to provide a means to communicate with prospective employers to provide them a chance to know more about my work and to provide prior notifications and updates to current employers regarding work status.

abstrac: I am a Website Development and Digital Marketing expert based in Mumbai, India helping clients across the globe to get their business online and increase revenues exponentially!
bio:
Hey!

Rajan this side based in Mumbai, India. I have completed a Bachelor's in Engineering in Information Technology from the University of Mumbai, India in 2014. My goal is to deliver premium websites and online marketing services to clients from various industries across the globe.

In the last 7+ years, I have worked with clients from E-commerce, Business Services, Real Estate, Finance, Education, Retail, FMCG, Technology, Telecommunication, and a lot more across the US, UK, Australia, Canada, France, Vietnam, India, and all around the world!

Services:
- Business Website Development
- Ecommerce Website Development
- WordPress Development
- Website Redesigning
- Website Maintenance
- SSL Installation
- Additional Feature Implementation

- Digital Marketing Consultation
- Search Engine Optimization
- Social Media Marketing
- Pay Per Click Advertising
- Ecommerce SEO Services
- Google Ads
- Email Marketing
- Lead Generation
- Online Reputation Management

- Domain & Server Management
- G Suite Solutions
- Logo Designing
- Social Media Setup

Get on the highway to success with my expertise in website development and digital marketing! I create highly optimized, user-friendly, high converting, and SEO optimized websites that create a strong brand presence in front of your clients.

My Digital Marketing services will help you increase sales and revenues with the right marketing strategy customized according to your industry and business requirements. 

Get in touch today for a free consultation for your business growth!

We charge 40% upfront and the rest 60% based on milestone completions.

We are available across various time zones to reduce communication gaps and minimize unnecessary project delays. Communication via Call / Email / Skype / Zoom / WhatsApp / Google Meet.

abstrac: Dr. Jennifer L. Weinberg MD MPH MBE
Preventive, Lifestyle & Environmental Medicine Physician, Professional Editor & Health Communications Expert, Corporate Wellness Specialist, Speaker, Professor, Author of The Whole Cure
bio: As a Preventive & Lifestyle Medicine Physician, Public Health Consultant, Corporate Wellness Expert, Speaker, Editor and Communications Consultant, Author of The Whole Cure and Certified Health Coach, I offer innovative online wellness and education programs for individuals looking for sustainable optimal health; as well as health care professionals seeking innovative health outreach and editorial services and resources; and corporations wanting to integrate a comprehensive approach to corporate wellness! I have extensive teaching and speaking experience and bring my rich experience in health communications, writing and professional editing to academic and media projects. Additionally, I am the author of The Whole Cure: 52 Essential Prescriptions to Overcome Overwhelm, Reclaim Balance and Reconnect with a Life You Love! available in paperback and Kindle! http://amzn.to/1wqppEV and regular contributor to sites like MindBodyGreen and The Chopra Center.

bio:
I'm Muhammad Atif. A dedicated freelancer with years of experience. I lead a small team of  highly skilled members and we have been working on different freelancing platforms for 5 years, and serving in digital marketing (Social Media & Search Engines Marketing, SEO), and WordPress Designing/Development

Our expertise are:
➕ Social Media Marketing(SMM):
☑️ Offering services for:
✔️ Facebook, ✔️ Twitter, ✔️ Instagram, ✔️ YouTube, ✔️ Google+, ✔️ LinkedIn, ✔️ Tiktok, ✔️ Pinterest, ✔️ Quora, ✔️ Tumbler

☑️Social Media content creation

✔️ On Page and Off Page Optimization, ✔️ Google Adwords, ✔️ Google Analytics, ✔️ PPC Management.

Product Research & Keyword Research (by using premium tools like ✔️ Viral Launch, ✔️ Keepa, ✔️Merchant Words, ✔️ Egrow ✔️ PPC Entourage ✔️ JungleScout),
